paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for KCNH2, including penetrance data.

patients.phenotype: QT prolongation and life-threatening ventricular tachycardia

individual_records.phenotype_details: Developed polymorphic ventricular tachycardia and QT prolongation after intravenous meperidine injection.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: He had no mutation in long QT syndrome genes (KCNQ1, KCNH2, and SCN5A), but single nucleotide polymorphisms were reported, including K897T in KCNH2.

functional_data.summary: K897T is a common polymorphism that may influence cardiac ion channel function.

variants.additional_notes: The variant K897T in KCNH2 was reported in the context of drug-induced QT prolongation.
key_quotes: K897T in KCNH2 is another common polymorphism and was reported to be associated with either short QT interval or long QT interval.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for KCNH2 variants were extracted successfully.
